item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being

Drop in relaxation session

The benefits of relaxation include improved health, well being and overall happiness. Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.

This week we will talk about the use of art for relaxation (visual and literary arts as well as music). Come experience the calming effects of art and creativity. We will do a few simple drawing exercises that are both relaxing and fun. You don't have to be an artist to be able to do them! We will also do a focused listening exercise and talk about other ways of stimulating our imagination through arts.
Please bring a piece of art you particularly like to share it with everybody if you want (A poem or a picture would be great).


Cost: $5
Location: 675 Massachusetts Ave.,
11th Floor
Cambridge, MA

Location Info: It is a tall, white/gray building at the corner of Mass Ave and Prospect St., right next to 'Central' (red line) T stop. When you enter the lobby, please take the elevator to 11th Floor, then take your left when exiting the elevator and go till the end of the hall. If you have any trouble finding me please call 617-784-4534.
